subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The emergence of running back Joseph Addai has helped the Indianapolis Colts overcome the loss of Edgerrin James, who rushed for at least 1,200 yards in five of his seven seasons with the team.
snippet: The emergence of running back Joseph Addai has helped the Indianapolis Colts overcome the loss of Edgerrin James, who rushed for at least 1,200 yards in five of his seven seasons with the team.
